description: Convolution of natural numbers with A023532.
formula: a(n) = (n(n + 5) - 4 )/2 - sum(k=2 to n) Floor(1/2 + sqrt(2(k + 2))). - Jan Hagberg (jan.hagberg(AT)stat.su.se), Oct 16 2002a(n)=(n+1)(n+2)/2-sum{k=1..n+1, floor((sqrt(8k+1)-1)/2)}; a(n)=sum{k=1..n+1, k-floor((sqrt(8k+1)-1)/2)}. - _Paul Barry_, May 24 2004
author: _Clark Kimberling_
